register.header: Register to optimize your job search

login.subHeader: Log in to continue tracking your responses
login.message: Authorisation was successful. Now you can set up your profile.

resetPassword.label: Enter a new password
resetPassword.subHeader: Enter a new password for further account access
resetPassword.passwordChange: Password change was successful. Log in with your new password
resetPassword.resetLink: The password reset link is not valid. Please try again

forgotPassword.subHeader: Enter the email associated with your account to recover your password.
forgotPassword.passwordChange: An email notification has been sent to you.

infoCards.optimizeJobSearch: Optimize your job search: save, analyze, achieve success
infoCards.pathToSuccess: Your path to success, tailored individually
infoCards.careerInYourHands: Your career is in your hands, wherever you are

validation.emailMax: Email must be no more than 254 characters
validation.emailMin: Email must be at least 4 characters
validation.passwordMax: Password must be no more than 14 characters
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

modalMappingModalTextMap.success: Registration was successful. Now you can customize your profile.
modalMappingModalTextMap.error: Check the entered data and try again.
modalMappingModalTextMap.errorMailExist: An account with this email already exists. Try logging in or resetting your password.
modalMappingModalTextMap.recoveryPassword: An account with this email already exists. Try logging in or resetting your password.
